data.eml:eml: Two new species of Centruroides Marx 1890 (Scorpiones: Buthidae) from Oaxaca, Mexico

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Santibáñez-López, Carlos E., Contreras-Félix, Gerardo A. (2013): Two new species of Centruroides Marx 1890 (Scorpiones: Buthidae) from Oaxaca, Mexico. Zootaxa 3734 (2): 130-140, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3734.2.2
